card.name: Motorcycle
card.text: Movement: Exhaust to get two extra movement points. Cannot use in Other Worlds.

card.name: Elder Sign
card.text: Any Phase: When sealing a gate, lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity and return this card to the box. You do not need to make a skill check or spend any Clue tokens to seal the gate. In addition, remove one doom token from the Ancient One's doom track.

card.name: Cultes des Goules
card.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and gain 1 Clue token, but lose 2 Sanity and discard Cultes Des Goules. If you fail, nothing happens.

card.name: Shrivelling
card.text: Any Phase: Cast and exhaust to gain +6 to Combat checks until the end of this combat.

card.name: Bind Monster
card.text: Any Phase: Cast and Discard this spell to pass one Combat check. You must roll successes equal to the monster's toughness to cast this spell. This spell doesn't work on Ancient Ones.

card.name: Find Gate
card.text: Movement: Cast and exhaust to immediately return to Arkham from an Other World.

card.name: Cross
card.text: Bonus: +0 Combat check (+3 if Opponent is Undead); +1 Horror check

card.name: Fight
card.text: +1 Fight\n\nWhen you spend a Clue token to add to any Fight check, add one extra bonus die.

card.name: Marksman
card.text: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll a Combat check.

card.name: Stealth
card.text: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll an Evade check.

card.name: Blessing
card.text: Upkeep: Roll a die and discard this card on a 1.\n\nWhen rolling dice, you score successes on a 4, 5, or 6. If you are Cursed, discard this card instead of gaining a Curse card.

card.name: Retainer
card.text: Upkeep: Gain $2, then roll a die. Discard this card on a 1.

card.name: Duke
card.text: +1 Maximum Sanity\n\nDiscard to immediately restore your Sanity to its maximum.
